**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 2.0 **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- A _boreal staff_ is chiseled from a cylinder of ice to form a spiky, jagged icicle, its surface gleaming with the colors of the northern lights. It gives the air around you a distinct chill. When used as a weapon, a _boreal staff_ is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. **Activate** ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per 10 minutes; **Effect** Attempt a Strike using the staff. That Strike deals 2d4 additional cold damage. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list. **Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells. Boreal Staff **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 2.0 **Price** 500 gp **Bulk** 1 ---
  • **Cantrip** [_frostbite_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539)
  • **1st** [_ chilling spray_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1975), [_gust of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1550)
  • **2nd** _ chilling spray_
  • **3rd** _chilling spray_, [_elemental absorption _](/Spells.aspx?ID=901)(water only)
Boreal Staff (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 2.0 **Price** 2,750 gp **Bulk** 1 --- This is a _+2 striking frost staff_.
  • **4th** _ chilling spray_, [_ice storm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2001)
  • **5th** [_howling blizzard_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1559), [_mantle of the frozen heart_](/Spells.aspx?ID=946)
Boreal Staff (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 2.0 **Price** 13,500 gp **Bulk** 1 --- This is a _+3 greater striking [frost](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2839) staff_. The additional cold damage from the activation ignores cold resistance.
  • **6th** _howling blizzard_
  • **7th** [_ frigid flurry_](/Spells.aspx?ID=916), _howling blizzard_
name: Boreal Staff (Greater)
